name: VIDEO: County Announces Innovative Substance Abuse Program at Psychiatric Hospital
description: A new program will help connect patients at the County Psychiatric Hospital with substance abuse treatment. It’s called the Accelerated Connections To Treatment Program, and details were announced today.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: A new program will help connect patients at the County Psychiatric Hospital with substance abuse treatment. It’s called the Accelerated Connections To Treatment Program, and details were announced today.
